channel.title: CSE Thesis Musings
channel.description: Recent content on CSE Thesis Musings

item.title: Course Outline
item.description: Course Aims The thesis provides an opportunity for you to bring together engineering principles learned over the previous years of study, and apply these principles to innovatively solve problems such as the development of a specific design and/or the investigation of a hypothesis.

item.title: What Is A Thesis
item.description: Note - A thesis is not an assignment A thesis is often more open-ended, without a specific conclusion You plan out the course of the work Thesis types Research Project Carry out a small focussed piece of research

item.title: What Goes In A Thesis
item.description: A thesis is a highly structured document, not a brain dump! Focus on the destination and not the journey

item.title: Useful Meetings
item.description: What did you do since the last meeting What are the obstacles you are facing How have you tried to overcome them What will you do before the next meeting

item.title: Capturing Network Activity (Securely)
item.description: Capturing Network Activity (in a secure manner) (hopefully) WiFi network that the vacuum cleaner can connect to. Packet capture TCP UDP Multicast Broadcasts Solutions Passive Monitoring Wired Monitoring - Hub graph LR A\[Device\] ---|data| B\[Hub\] B ---|data| C\[Device\] B ---|data| D\[Device\] B ---|data| E\[Device\] B ---|data| F\[Device\] An Ethernet hub naively broadcasts all packets from one port to the other, meaning that any device connected to that hub will receive packets destined for anyone.
